title: Lonely man seeks companions. Join team now and be indoctrinated
body: Lonely unwanted Bronze 2 scrub seeks a home instead of constant diamond smurfs barraging down on him to kill him in ranked. Join team now and you will help a very good cause

replies.body:
I'd gladly join, I'm silver 4 atm and my best roles are mid and ADC. 

Summoner name " I am Lauton" 

I was Gold 1 season 3 thanks to {{champion:34}} {{champion:22}} &{{champion:55}} 

If you'll have me that is. I prefer Skype for teamwork. Add me if you want me.

Hey Ragingfangs, I'm interested in joining a team. My roles in order from best to worst 

Mid
Jungle
Top
Supp
ADC

Well kind gent if we do end up making a team  i can do mid jungle or top. And if absoluteley neccesary support. I am just bad at adc though
Hey man you should join my community i just started. We have a lot of experience and will be starting up ranked teams as well as tournaments and coaching very soon. Add me on league
Ech. After searching and trying to create a team many times. I am beyond the point of caring. If someone comes with a proposistion to join a team i will join. If not i will just make my own
That title is such an eye grabber. Are you making a team, or looking to join?
